name: Dupan
description:
Dupan is visual novel that tells a story of an accountant who visits Dupan, a carnival, where she indulges in several "childish" activities. After indulging in such activites, an old childhood friend came by and proceeded to mock the accountant for being so childish and being an underachiever. The accountant feels as if what she has been doing until now are childish and a waste of time. She swore to never indulge or act in such childish behaviors again.

This game is made in 2 days for Global Game Jam 2022.

Link - https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/dupan-1

Additional credits (forgot to include it in the game):
